Intro.Description: I have been in the sector for more than 3 years working on multiple large projects with the most popular and demanded tools.

Resume.title: Resume
Resume.description1: I had the opportunity to work for a client with colleagues from other countries. The project consisted of creating an eCommerce platform from scratch. Creation of components in an Atomic way, calls to APIs, design of styles with Tailwind and constant communication in a team of 4 people.
Resume.description2: During these years I worked on various projects with tools such as Angular, ReactJS, Ionic, Bootstrap, API calls, version control, etc... My tasks consisted of troubleshooting and code optimization to the creation and design of components and lead the communication between the Back-End and Front-End team.
Resume.description3: I worked with Angular and React tools, learning the dynamics of working in a large company with daily meetings, periodic deliveries (Sprints) and use of version control (GIT and Bitbucket).
